game.name: Your Mom
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 너네 엄마가 왔어, 빨리 와서 엄마랑 즐겁게 놀자.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your mom is here, come quickly to play happily with your mom.

reviewHighlights.text: Your mom was the best thing that happend to my life. I love your mom, cheap too. 10/10 would share your mom with all my friends, your mom should'nt be...
